name: Ying Cao 0001
content: Ying CAO's Homepage Ying CAO Email: caoying59@gmail.com About me I received the PhD degree in Computer Science from the City University of Hong Kong (CityU), under supervision of Rynson Lau and Antoni Chan. I obtained the BEng and MEng degrees in Software Engineering from Northeastern University (China). I was an intern at Microsoft Research Aisa (MSRA). I was a postdoctoral researcher in the Department of Computer Science at the CityU. Research My primary research interest is Data-driven Design Intelligence, which aims to answer a challenging question: how can computers learn to design from data and augment humans in the design process? The long-term goal of my research is to empower computers with design intelligence: the capabilities of machines to perceive, understand and create designs like humans. I am particularly interested in learning rich models that describe the structure, semantics, style and functionality of designs, and exploring their potential use in the creative process.
